structured_data.overview: The Planning Division of El Segundo promotes the well-being of residents, visitors, property owners and businesses through long-range planning via the General Plan and specific development standards in the Zoning Code.

documents.title: Zoning Code
documents.description: Regulates size and height of buildings, specific types of uses and establishes procedures for development approvals

documents.title: General Plan
documents.description: Serves as the City's road map and guides the overall form of the City

forms.name: Planning Applications
forms.purpose: For development approvals such as Use Permits, Modifications and Variances

permits_licenses.description: Approval for specific types of uses
Approval for modifications to existing structures
Approval for exceptions to zoning requirements

structured_data.other_info: The Planning Division offers resources including specific plans, handouts and forms, development projects information, environmental/CEQA information, maps, and development fees information.
